mapper.select: select t4.`name`, t1.node_id nodeId, t1.operator, t2.source_node sourceNode, t2.target_node targetNode, t3.root_node rootNode from workflow_event_history t1,workflow_def_edge t2,workflow_def_graph t3,workflow_def_node t4 where t1.graph_id = t2.graph_id and t1.node_id = t4.node_id and t1.graph_id = t3.graph_id and t2.graph_id = t3.graph_id and t1.node_id = t2.source_node and t1.next_node_id = t2.target_node and t1.event_id = #{eventId} order by t3.root_node
mapper.insert: insert into workflow_log_message (log_id, operator, operator_name, create_time, message, event_id,node_id ) select #{log.logId}, #{log.operator}, #{log.operatorName}, #{log.createTime}, #{log.message}, #{log.eventId}, t2.root_node from workflow_def_graph_business_rel t1,workflow_def_graph t2 where t1.graph_id = t2.graph_id and t1.business_id = #{businessId}
